name: iZombie Season 4
info:
• 中文名: 我是僵尸 第四季
  • 别名: 我是丧尸 第四季
  • 集数: 13
  • 类型: 剧情 / 科幻 / 恐怖 / 犯罪
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视台: CW
  • 首播国家: 美国

eps.name: Are You Ready for Some Zombies?
eps.name_cn: 你准备好迎接僵尸了吗？
eps.desc: While investigating the murder of a Seattle Seahawk superfan, Liv has a surprising vision; Major mentors young, homeless zombies; Ravi carries a torch for Peyton; Blaine deals with a threat looming from his past.

eps.name: Blue Bloody
eps.desc: When Liv eats the brains of a despicable dowager, she must determine which one of her disgruntled servants killed her; Clive and Bozzio struggle to maintain a healthy relationship.

eps.name: Brainless in Seattle, Part 1
eps.desc: Liv eats the brains of a hopeless romantic, and she can't stop herself from meddling in Clive's relationship; Major and Liv continue trying to work through their differences; Blaine is approached with an interesting offer.

eps.name: Brainless in Seattle, Part 2
eps.desc: Liv and Clive realize the murder they are investigating is the work of a serial killer; Major goes into dangerous territory.

eps.name: Goon Struck
eps.desc: While investigating the murder of a hockey player, Liv stumbles into Chase Graves' evil plan; Major is forced to make a horrible decision; Peyton tries to contain a volatile situation.

eps.name: Don't Hate the Player, Hate the Brain
